content.query:
--(DQL)
SELECT TOP (100) [Employee_Name]
,[EmpID]
,[MarriedID]
,[MaritalStatusID]
,[GenderID]
,[EmpStatusID]
,[DeptID]
,[PerfScoreID]
,[FromDiversityJobFairID]
,[Salary]
,[Termd]
,[PositionID]
,[Position]
,[State]
,[Zip]
,[DOB]
,[Sex]
,[MaritalDesc]
,[CitizenDesc]
,[HispanicLatino]
,[RaceDesc]
,[DateofHire]
,[DateofTermination]
,[TermReason]
,[EmploymentStatus]
,[Department]
,[ManagerName]
,[ManagerID]
,[RecruitmentSource]
,[PerformanceScore]
,[EngagementSurvey]
,[EmpSatisfaction]
,[SpecialProjectsCount]
,[LastPerformanceReview_Date]
,[Absences]
 FROM [hrtable].[Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 file]



 --  (DDL)
 --CREATE 
 CREATE TABLE A3S (
    PersonID int,
    LastName varchar(255),
    FirstName varchar(255),
    Address varchar(255),
    City varchar(255)
);
 -- ALTER
ALTER TABLE A3S
ADD Subscripition varchar(255);

 -- DROP
 ALTER TABLE A3S
 DROP COLUMN LastName;

 -- TRUNCATE
 TRUNCATE TABLE A3S;
